01/27/11 05:03 PM ET Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not make a bid for the GOP presidential nomination in 2012, telling supporters in a letter that he would rather serve the state of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence wrote, Still, Mike Pence is not officially jumping into the race for Indiana governor just yet.
